body.bibl: Maksymiuk, Katarzyna. “Mass Deportations in Syria and Northern Mesopotamia under the Rule of Xusrō I Anōšīrvān (540–542).” In War and Population Displacement: Lessons of History, edited by Fernando Puell de la Villa and David García Hernán, 46–53.
